      • initializeCustomTools

        private void initializeCustomTools()
        Initializes the customTools Hashtable, which is later used to allow servers to configure which tools can be applied to which tasks.

      • initializePetIndex

        private void initializePetIndex()
        Initializes the PetLimitChecker based on total_pet_limit, dog_limit, cat_limit, and bird_limit integers in the config.

      • initializeDBC

        private void initializeDBC()
        Initializes the DBWrapper based on config options mysql.enable, mysql.host, mysql.port, mysql.database, mysql.username, and mysql.password. If DBWrapper is false, it will use the SQLite connection rather than a MySQL one.

      • updateDBC

        private void updateDBC()
        Updates the database if it can, otherwise turns database = null, negatively impacting virtually every aspect of this plugin

      • createTables

        private void createTables()
        Creates the tables if they don't exist, using the DBWrapper

      • updateLFReference

        public void updateLFReference(java.lang.String lfRegionName)
        Updates the lfReference property of ProtectedRegions that have LostAndFoundRegion of name lfRegionName
        Parameters:
        lfRegionName - LostAndFoundRegion's name that should be refreshed within all ProtectedRegions.

      • removeLFReference

        public void removeLFReference(java.lang.String lfRegionName)
        Removes all lfRefernece properties of ProtectedRegions that have name lfRegionName
        Parameters:
        lfRegionName - The name of the LostAndFoundRegion that is being removed
